snippet: Tax breaks offered by the federal government tend to overwhelmingly favor the richest segment of the population, while entitlement benefits and other federal social benefits are more evenly distributed.
lead_paragraph: Tax breaks offered by the federal government tend to overwhelmingly favor the richest segment of the population, while entitlement benefits and other federal social benefits are more evenly distributed.

headline.seo: Who Gets the Breaks and Benefits
headline.main: Who Gets the Breaks and Benefits
